ESC1.title: ADCS ESC1
ESC1.info: Domain User to Domain Admin escalation via misconfigured certificate templates.

ESC3.title: ADCS ESC3
ESC3.info: Domain User to Domain Admin escalation via misconfigured certificate templates.

ESC4.title: ADCS ESC4
ESC4.info: Domain User to Domain Admin escalation via misconfigured certificate templates.

Kerberoasting.title: Kerberoasting
Kerberoasting.info: Makes a target user have a SPN in order to acquire a TGT from them.

ASREPRoasting.title: AS-REP Roasting
ASREPRoasting.info: Steal domain credentials by abusing a user with Kerberos pre-auth disabled.

UserConstrainedDelegation.title: User Constrained Delegation
UserConstrainedDelegation.info: Makes a target user have constrained delegation on a spn with the DC

ComputerConstrainedDelegation.title: Computer Constrained Delegation
ComputerConstrainedDelegation.info: Makes a target computer have constrained delegation on a spn with the DC

AddCredsForMimikatz.title: Add User Creds for Mimikatz Dump
AddCredsForMimikatz.info: Injects a target user's creds on target computer.

LocalPrivesc1.title: Local Privilege Escalation 1
LocalPrivesc1.info: Gives target user write access to a service's binpath.

LocalPrivesc2.title: Local Privilege Escalation 2
LocalPrivesc2.info: Gives target user write access path of service that is unquoted.

LocalPrivesc3.title: Local Privilege Escalation 3
LocalPrivesc3.info: Gives target user ability to runas admin.

ACLs.title: ACLs
ACLs.info: Gives one user GenericAll permissions over another user
